name: Tamil Word Search Game
description:
Word search game is completely free, created to help kids, students and adults to learn Tamil words in a fun way.

It is also a brain game and addictive to play.

How is our game unique?

★ Two game modes are available
★ Vagai Vilayattu - 200 word categories with 3000+ unique words
★ Mudivili Vilayattu - Unlimited randomly generated word puzzles. It has 11,000+ unique words
★ Simple and fast interface
★ You can use hints to reveal words that are difficult to find

How to play the Game?

Swipe your finger in any one of 8 directions ie. Left to Right, Right to Left, Top to Bottom, Bottom to Top and diagonally to find out 8 hidden words from the 9x9 grid.
